title: Awesome List Updates on Sep 27, 2020

items.title: Awesome Competitive Programming
items.content_text:
### Tutorial Websites

- ☆: ★★☆

  Name: [演算法筆記 (Algorithm Notes) (Chinese)](http://web.ntnu.edu.tw/~algo/)

  Description: One of the most popular tutorial websites among the Taiwanese competitive programming community. The maintainer for this website spends immense efforts on researching algorithms.
items.content_html:
Tutorial Websites

    Name: 演算法筆記 (Algorithm Notes) (Chinese)

    Description: One of the most popular tutorial websites among the Taiwanese competitive programming community. The maintainer for this website spends immense efforts on researching algorithms.

items.title: Awesome Flutter
items.content_text:
### English / Game Engine resources

*   [It's all widgets! Flutter podcast](https://open.spotify.com/show/2qJVeu47e2eAum4j7lxXXv?si=d26QVJQsSRyRHeybfL_01Q) - by [Hillel Coren](https://twitter.com/hillelcoren).

### Portuguese / Game Engine resources

*   [Universo Flutter](https://open.spotify.com/show/4AlxqGkkrqe0mfIx3Mi7Xt?si=1eC0a22MR1OkEAT7HErT-A) - by [Matias de Andrea](http://deandreamatias.com/).

### Spanish / Game Engine resources

*   [Código Flutter](https://open.spotify.com/show/3QUTYR6jspNxHK8akJFxYf?si=MZtgjIMyTi6-WgN9Go6vZQ) - by [Guillermo García](https://guillermogarcia.es/).

items.title: Awesome Home Assistant
items.content_text:
### Add-ons / Official Add-ons

*   [DuckDNS (⭐1.7k)](https://github.com/home-assistant/hassio-addons/blob/master/duckdns/DOCS.md) - Updates your Duck DNS IP address and generate SSL using Let's Encrypt.
*   [File editor (⭐1.7k)](https://github.com/home-assistant/hassio-addons/blob/master/configurator/DOCS.md) - Browser-based configuration file editor.
*   [Mosquitto (⭐1.7k)](https://github.com/home-assistant/hassio-addons/blob/master/mosquitto/DOCS.md) - Fast and reliable MQTT broker.
*   [Terminal & SSH (⭐1.7k)](https://github.com/home-assistant/hassio-addons/blob/master/ssh/DOCS.md) - Allows logging in remotely to using a web terminal or SSH client.
*   [Samba (⭐1.7k)](https://github.com/home-assistant/hassio-addons/blob/master/samba/DOCS.md) - Access your configuration files using Windows network shares.
*   [NGINX SSL proxy (⭐1.7k)](https://github.com/home-assistant/hassio-addons/blob/master/nginx_proxy/DOCS.md) - Reverse proxy with SSL termination.
*   [deCONZ (⭐1.7k)](https://github.com/home-assistant/hassio-addons/blob/master/deconz/DOCS.md) - Control a ZigBee network using ConBee or RaspBee hardware by Dresden Elektronik.
*   [TellStick (⭐1.7k)](https://github.com/home-assistant/hassio-addons/blob/master/tellstick/DOCS.md) - Run a TellStick and TellStick Duo service.
*   [Ada (⭐1.7k)](https://github.com/home-assistant/hassio-addons/blob/master/ada/DOCS.md) - Ada is voice assistant powered by Almond which is open and privacy-preserving.
*   [Almond (⭐1.7k)](https://github.com/home-assistant/hassio-addons/blob/master/almond/DOCS.md) - The Open, Privacy-Preserving Virtual Assistant.
*   [HomeMatic (⭐1.7k)](https://github.com/home-assistant/hassio-addons/blob/master/homematic/DOCS.md) - HomeMatic central based on OCCU.
*   [Let's Encrypt (⭐1.7k)](https://github.com/home-assistant/hassio-addons/blob/master/letsencrypt/DOCS.md) - Get a free SSL certificate from Let's Encrypt; an open and automated certificate authority (CA).
*   [MariaDB (⭐1.7k)](https://github.com/home-assistant/hassio-addons/blob/master/mariadb/DOCS.md) - An open source relational database (fork of MySQL).
items.content_html:
Add-ons / Official Add-ons

  • DuckDNS (⭐1.7k) - Updates your Duck DNS IP address and generate SSL using Let's Encrypt.
  • File editor (⭐1.7k) - Browser-based configuration file editor.
  • Mosquitto (⭐1.7k) - Fast and reliable MQTT broker.
  • Terminal & SSH (⭐1.7k) - Allows logging in remotely to using a web terminal or SSH client.
  • Samba (⭐1.7k) - Access your configuration files using Windows network shares.
  • NGINX SSL proxy (⭐1.7k) - Reverse proxy with SSL termination.
  • deCONZ (⭐1.7k) - Control a ZigBee network using ConBee or RaspBee hardware by Dresden Elektronik.
  • TellStick (⭐1.7k) - Run a TellStick and TellStick Duo service.
  • Ada (⭐1.7k) - Ada is voice assistant powered by Almond which is open and privacy-preserving.
  • Almond (⭐1.7k) - The Open, Privacy-Preserving Virtual Assistant.
  • HomeMatic (⭐1.7k) - HomeMatic central based on OCCU.
  • Let's Encrypt (⭐1.7k) - Get a free SSL certificate from Let's Encrypt; an open and automated certificate authority (CA).
  • MariaDB (⭐1.7k) - An open source relational database (fork of MySQL).

items.title: Awesome Software Architecture
items.content_text:
### Design Patterns

*   [Ports and adapters pattern](https://jmgarridopaz.github.io/content/hexagonalarchitecture.html) - Decouple the application core logic from the services it uses.
items.content_html:
Design Patterns

  • Ports and adapters pattern - Decouple the application core logic from the services it uses.

items.title: Awesome Ansible
items.content_text:
### Tools

*   [Ansible Doctor (⭐141)](https://github.com/thegeeklab/ansible-doctor) - Simple annotation like documentation generator for Ansible roles based on Jinja2 templates.
items.content_html:
Tools

  • Ansible Doctor (⭐141) - Simple annotation like documentation generator for Ansible roles based on Jinja2 templates.

items.title: Awesome Machine Learning
items.content_text:
### Python / Computer Vision

*   [pytessarct (⭐6.2k)](https://github.com/madmaze/pytesseract) - Python-tesseract is an optical character recognition (OCR) tool for python. That is, it will recognize and "read" the text embedded in images. Python-tesseract is a wrapper for [Google's Tesseract-OCR Engine (⭐68k)](https://github.com/tesseract-ocr/tesseract).
items.content_html:
Python / Computer Vision

  • pytessarct (⭐6.2k) - Python-tesseract is an optical character recognition (OCR) tool for python. That is, it will recognize and "read" the text embedded in images. Python-tesseract is a wrapper for Google's Tesseract-OCR Engine (⭐68k).

items.title: Awesome Actionscript3
items.content_text:
### Multimedia / Image

*   [BlurHash (⭐8)](https://github.com/roipeker/as3-blurhash) - A BlurHash encoder/decoder implementation in ActionScript 3.0..
items.content_html:
Multimedia / Image

  • BlurHash (⭐8) - A BlurHash encoder/decoder implementation in ActionScript 3.0..
